message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $15,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $12,000 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I really need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I see you're trying to be reasonable, but $11,500 is simply too far below what I need to get for this product.  I'm willing to go a little lower, but $12,500 is the absolute minimum I can accept.  If you're serious about getting this product, I believe this is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $12,250. Can we meet at this price?
